body_html:
The bigger issue is for our pip packages. maybe the flag is not being propagated properly, but even with this flag we run into ABI incompatibility issues in our pip packages.
If this solves the problem for libtensorflow, that is great! we can solve the pip issue separately.

body:
The bigger issue is for our pip packages. maybe the flag is not being propagated properly, but even with this flag we run into ABI incompatibility issues in our pip packages.
If this solves the problem for libtensorflow, that is great! we can solve the pip issue separately.
